name: Black Label Trading Co. - Santa Muerte - Short Robusto
brand: Black Label Trading Co., Santa Muerte
additionalNotes: Black Label Trading Co. has become immensely popular in recent years with delicious handmade premium cigars, and they have another winner on their hands with the Santa Muerte cigar. These limited-edition gems feature a sophisticated blend mixed with a top-shelf Ecuador Habano wrapper and binder over a whopping six-leaf combo of aged long fillers from Nicaragua, the Dominican Republic, and Mexico. My palate has an intensely complex full-bodied smoke effortlessly delivered by top-notch construction, and once lit, I experienced layer upon layer of espresso, malt, spice, white pepper, and cocoa. With these luxurious smokes being added to their top-rated portfolio.Â
